document_data.name: Blacklung Fever
document_data.mainbody: '''Blacklung fever''' was a potentially fatal [[disease]] and one of the [[Five Fevers]] of [[Faer√ªn]].
document_data.Acquisition: The disease was transmissible through the air. It took a day for symptoms to manifest.
document_data.Effects: Sufferers of blacklung fever suffered a steady loss of their stamina and endurance. While a healthy individual could fight off the disease in a matter of days, the disease could ultimately be fatal.
document_data.History: [[Deldagg Huldgrym]], the founder of the [[Bloodaxe Mercenary Company]], died of blacklung fever in the {{YearlinkName|1331}}.
